name: Pear, Gorgonzola And Mesclun Salad
keywords: fall, gorgonzola, mixed greens, pear, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces Gorgonzola or other creamy blue cheese
12 cups mixed greens, washed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and core the pears; cut them into thin slices, and toss with the lemon juice. Cover, and refrigerate until needed.
Crumble the Gorgonzola into small bits; cover and refrigerate until needed.
To serve, toss the pear, cheese and greens together with as much dressing as desired. Serve immediately.
